title: bukkit貌似要换新系统
author: DarcJC
txt_content:
http://dev.bukkit.org/   就在主页那
翻译：
正在准备新的系统
发表于 2014.4.9  05:11
当我们开始准备新的系统（更新功能）我们正在找出mods的类别。如果你现在是在一个传统的范畴，而不在新的类，将会更难找到用户。我们说，没有被移动到新的类别的mods，作者应该按照MODS的描述（希望），而将mods放到适当的类别。当然你可以编辑类别和改变他们所属类别。请不要拿“创世神”，它不会是一个新系统的可选范围，我们希望你选择一个合适的子范畴。当我们这样做，我们也希望看到插件作者添加默认图片（？看不懂）的任何非API，非纯文字。这个图像显示在搜索列表，将会吸引更多的用户看到你的mods。请原谅我们，如果我们把他放到某个类别，而你觉得这个mod不属于这个类别。

[backcolor=rgb(252, 252, 252) !important]Preparing for the new SystemPosted by [color=#0850 !important]Jadedcat on Apr 9, 2014 at 05:11
As we start preparing for the new system (yay new features) we are working on getting mods moved out of the Legacy Categories. Right now if you are in a Legacy Category and not in new categories your mod is harder for the users to find. We are reading through the descriptions of mods that have not been moved to new categories and are putting them in the (hopefully) appropriate category. You can of course edit the categories and change them to where you feel the mod belongs. Please do not pick "World Gen" as it will not be a selectable category in the new system, pick an appropriate sub-category.While we are doing this we would also like to see mod authors add a default image to any non-api, non-library mod.  This image shows up in the search list and draws more attention to your mod from the users browsing the lists.Please forgive us if we put your mod somewhere you don't feel it belongs.5 comments
